subject: SimPedalsConfig V3,5
description_text:
Pro plus pedal owner. I recently had a computer failure, and after
lodging SimPedalsConfig V4.0 I get a message that my firmware is
incompatible with V4 and I need to use V3.5.
May I have a copy of that version please?
Love the pedals.

David Beickert

conversations.body_text: Hi David Beickert,     Please try downloading it from this link first. If it doesn’t work, please provide a full screenshot of the software, and I will assist you in resolving the issue.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YhwexXrW_OvE3QTHZZ302qeBnYuMA9WA/view?usp=drive_link

I am not able to calibrate using this vs.  I have  compressed files vs 3.0
& 3.5 but both open as vs 3.0. It show that it recognizes the pedals but no
meters show when i press them. It only runs for about 30 seconds before
this message pops up.


Note, the pedals are calibrated for only 1 game, forza horizon, no others.

On Sat, Aug 9, 2025, 10:48 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi David Beickert,  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link     Please first download FreeJoy version 1.7.0, then use the pedal .cfg recovery file attached to restore the pedal settings. After the restoration is complete, you can proceed to calibrate it using other software.

Thank you, l was successful in using Freejoy to calibrate and send new
config file to pedals.
Unfortunately that only works for 1 game, Forza Horizon 5. In all other
games the pedals are not calibrated

On Thu, Oct 16, 2025, 2:31 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi David Beickert,  Is it not working in Assetto Corsa? If it works in one game, it should also work in other compatible games. Please record a video of testing the pedals in Freejoy, along with a video showing the progress bars, so I can verify the situation.
